creator: stevel@apache.org
text:
I'd expect to be told off here:
  <target name="testFrom">
    <manifest file="mftestfrom.mf" >
      <section name="Test">
        <attribute name="before" value="Baz" />
        <attribute name="From" value="illegal3"/>
        <attribute name="after" value="Baz" />
      </section>
    </manifest>
  </target>

But instead we silently strip the from attribute.
